text: Before this #BridgeCollapse, Murray & Roberts were a brand to be reckoned with. Genuinely. - If you weren't Murray & Roberts, sit. Shush!
#BridgeCollapse Group CEO sends condolences to bereaved families. 'We are doing everything in our power to establish what happened'
I dreamt about this bridge collapse, man. I'm still shook by it because it could've killed someone I love and/or know
